exp1: Both vk and google music don't have official API for music, so to migration you need to:
exp3: Click on this extension icon and input Login/Password below
noVkSongs: If extension raises 'Could not fetch songs from vk' - please refresh tab with music in chrome and try again
noLogin: If extension raises 'Failed to connect to Google Music' - please make sure you've inputed correct login/password
